songs.title: That werk
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeaaa, I'm just sitting minding my business
Hear the sound of that
That's jewelry
Where we gonna go with this
I don't know
Lets go wit the flow

Listen
Pay attention

I paid that chic Sallie Mae back
Now you see me in that black Maybach
Hip-hop hooray
I call up my Jersey niggas to send shots your way
(pa, pa, pa)
Yea
Ain’t you glad that we all made it
Pop the cork
Pour it out
We all celebrating
Ima jack of all trades
I wear many hats
My black show no grays
Bloods African
Threads Italian
Wife’s Dominican
I flow like an Amphibian
I’m such a gentleman
Look at the Swagg
I told mommy it’s a stickup
So put it in a bag
That’s how it goes
Rose gold with gold
That’s what I choose
It’s all a player knows
Ain’t she so find
Oh yea she’s mind
There’s ice on the wrists
Who said I could freeze time

[Hook]
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that
Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that
Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that


Verse 2:
Praised due to all Kings
I tip my hat by any means
Cuz it’s hard to be the boss
They were throwing stones while Jesus carried the cross
I do my dirt by my lonely
I think I’m better than one person
And that’s the old me
Let’s go
What’s a nigga do
When he's backed against the wall
And his broke and the rents due
Work!
So hold on to what you making
Spend what you have to the rest is for the taken
Balaclava face mask
Avocado grapes bath to smooth out the situation
Spirit of a slave
So you know I hustle hard
Ima ride this wave until I testify to god
Shorty’s a physiologist
So she’s good with the brain
Her therapy be toes curling
It’s so insane
My bruah Ja
He’s the mane
Stay blowing jane
Sitting in his Range
Dipping in and out of lanes
Why ya cowards lie on tracks like the D train
Ain’t following the rules
Trying to crossover the game

[Hook]
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that
Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that
Werk, Werk
You violate you get that
Werk, Werk
You see me puttin in that
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk, Werk
